(Time:15mins)

Hi Jack,

I’ve pushed the Special Consultation live and updated the Facelift page. However, the Facelift page is not fully complete yet, we’re still working on the remaining changes you mentioned.

Here are the links for your review:
Special Consultation
Facelift Page

We will get back to you once everythying is completed.

@glen need your help with the remaining tasks.

Task 1: ✅DONE
Can we go love with the following link

https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/product/consultation-special/

But please make it only accessible via above link and not on normal navigation of site

if we can make it $250 consult price and it expires April 30.

Task 2: ✅DONE
Can I edit the landing page you made for us for Digital Maas for google adwords for Facelift
I wanted to change the video and add tow more videos


Task 3: ✅DONE

and add the following two before and after videos

-https://vimeo.com/manage/videos/1065738542

https://vimeo.com/manage/videos/1065738513


Tasks Summary:
  • Adjust the form to display only one dot per option instead of two. ❌
  • Removed the "General," "Nose," and "Non-Surgical" sections. ✅DONE
  • Updated the "Why Have a Facelift?" section to full width. ✅ DONE
  • Added two new videos above the "What Can Be Achieved?" section. ✅ DONE
  • Changed the background image in the "Procedure Snapshot" section to the book image. (⚠️ Image uploaded, but it needs adjustment as it currently looks awkward, assistance needed)
Page URL: https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/facelift/

and if we can ensure the videos embed on page and play on page and not navigate away to vimeo or new window
